name: @christiangalsterer/mongodb-driver-prometheus-exporter
author: Christian Galsterer
description: Prometheus exporter to monitor the MongoDB Node.js driver

scripts.ci: npm i --save-dev && npm run format && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test && npm run renovate:config
scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:deps
scripts.clean:deps: rm -rf ./node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json && npm run deps
scripts.release:prepare: npm run clean && npm i && npm i --save-dev && npm run format && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.release:major: npm run release:prepare && npm version major -m 'build(release): release %s' && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:prepare && npm version minor -m 'build(release): release %s' && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:prepare && npm version patch -m 'build(release): release %s' && git push && git push --tags
